trans-unit.source: Provides data for the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs class is used to supply event values to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event and to enable you to specify a custom Windows identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs 類別用來提供事件的值給**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件，並讓您指定自訂的 Windows 身分識別目前的要求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>建構 WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs 物件，使用 IIS 和目前所提供的 Windows 識別<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>並將其傳遞給**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs 物件提供給屬性**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件設定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>給自訂<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>物件。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定的值<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>屬性期間**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件時，IIS 提供的身分識別用於做為識別目前要求的 Windows。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IIS 使用匿名驗證，則<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>屬性設定為傳回的識別<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>方法。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised only when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**就會引發事件時，才驗證<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>設<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>和<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>是應用程式使用中的 HTTP 模組。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a newly created instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新建立的執行個體的<xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>建構<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>物件使用 IIS 和目前所提供的 Windows 識別<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>並將其傳遞給**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: The Windows identity object.
trans-unit.target: Windows 身分識別物件。

trans-unit.source: The context for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>目前 HTTP 要求的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> provides access to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> objects for the current request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>提供存取<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>， <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>目前要求的物件。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>目前 HTTP 要求的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Windows identity passed to the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 取得傳遞至 Windows 身分識別<xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>建構<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>物件使用 IIS 和目前所提供的 Windows 識別<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>並將其傳遞給**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, the Identity property is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IIS 使用匿名驗證，所傳回的識別設定識別屬性<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>方法。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Windows identity passed to the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Windows 識別傳遞至<xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object to be associated with the current request.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>要與目前的要求相關聯的物件。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: You can use the User property to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用使用者內容來設定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>給自訂<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>物件。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the User property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不指定期間的使用者屬性的值**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件時，IIS 提供的身分識別用於做為識別目前要求的 Windows。

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IIS 使用匿名驗證，則<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>屬性設定為傳回的識別<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>方法。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object to be associated with the current request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>要與目前的要求相關聯的物件。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>
